mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Support (supportId,supportDate,supportItemId, category, creditcard, exprdate, cardtype, billtofirstname, billtolastname, amount) VALUES(#{supportId},#{supportDate},#{supportItemId}, #{supportCategory}, #{creditCard}, #{expiryDate}, #{cardType}, #{billToFirstName}, #{billToLastName}, #{amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE adoptitem SET supportamount= supportamount + #{amount} WHERE itemid=#{supportItemId}
mapper.select: SELECT * from Support ORDER BY supportDate desc LIMIT 1
